function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to COVID-19 for workers in poorly ventilated spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems or using portable air cleaners with HEPA filters","Technologies":"Portable air cleaners with HEPA filters, electrostatic filtration-based devices","People":"Workers in poorly ventilated spaces","Owner":"Employers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission due to close proximity among workers","Mitigation":"Installing physical barriers to maintain distance and limit droplet transmission","Technologies":"Plastic shielding, mobile drawer, partitions","People":"Workers in small businesses","Owner":"Employers, facility managers"}]}
